Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon migrated to Paldea from distant lands long ago. The gel secreted by its feathers repels water and grime.
Generation IX.Violet: Its strong legs let it easily swim around in even fast-flowing rivers. It likes to keep things tidy and is prone to overthinking things.

Generation IX.Scarlet: First partner Pokémon from Clavell in Cabo Poco
Generation IX.Violet: First partner Pokémon from Clavell in Cabo Poco
